title: Greg Miller's Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire Premiere Stories - The Kinda Funny Podcast (Ep. 307)
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KF20 for $20 off each pair of polarized sunglasses.

Go to http://robinhood.com/boost to subscribe to Robinhood Gold and get a 3% match on every dollar you transfer in from another retirement account. Offer good through April 30th.

Greg and Gen went to New York for Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire. Did the trip -- and ride in the Ecto-1 -- live up to the hype?! Let's find out!

Thank you for the support!
